metric_tracker dbNameMetricsEnabled=true appNameMetricsEnabled=true
----
counter_1 1
counter_1{db_name="test_db",app_name="test_app"} 1
counter_2 1
counter_2{db_name="test_db",app_name="test_app",tenant_id="test_tenant"} 1
counter_3 1.5
counter_3{db_name="test_db",app_name="test_app"} 1.5
gauge_1 1
gauge_1{db_name="test_db",app_name="test_app"} 1
gauge_2 1.5
gauge_2{db_name="test_db",app_name="test_app"} 1.5


metric_tracker dbNameMetricsEnabled=false appNameMetricsEnabled=false
----
counter_1 1
counter_2 1
counter_2{tenant_id="test_tenant"} 1
counter_3 1.5
gauge_1 1
gauge_2 1.5


metric_tracker dbNameMetricsEnabled=true appNameMetricsEnabled=false
----
counter_1 1
counter_1{db_name="test_db"} 1
counter_2 1
counter_2{db_name="test_db",tenant_id="test_tenant"} 1
counter_3 1.5
counter_3{db_name="test_db"} 1.5
gauge_1 1
gauge_1{db_name="test_db"} 1
gauge_2 1.5
gauge_2{db_name="test_db"} 1.5


metric_tracker dbNameMetricsEnabled=false appNameMetricsEnabled=true
----
counter_1 1
counter_1{app_name="test_app"} 1
counter_2 1
counter_2{app_name="test_app",tenant_id="test_tenant"} 1
counter_3 1.5
counter_3{app_name="test_app"} 1.5
gauge_1 1
gauge_1{app_name="test_app"} 1
gauge_2 1.5
gauge_2{app_name="test_app"} 1.5
